src:
Data dan Fakta Serie A: AC Milan vs Lazio
02 Nov 2019, 15:02 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Peringkat 10 AC Milan akan menjamu peringkat 5 Lazio pada pekan ke-11 Serie A 2019/20, Senin (04/11/2019). Berikut beberapa data dan fakta yang melatarbelakangi pertandingan di San Siro ini.
Dalam laga kandangnya melawan Lazio di Serie A musim lalu, Milan menang 1-0 lewat penalti Franck Kessie menit 79.
Terakhir kali menjamu Lazio, di leg kedua babak semifinal Coppa Italia musim lalu, Milan menyerah 0-1 oleh gol tunggal Joaquin Correa menit 58, dan tersingkir dengan agregat 0-1.
Milan cuma menang 2 kali dan kalah 1 kali dalam 7 laga terakhirnya melawan Lazio di semua kompetisi, kandang dan tandang (M2 S4 K1).
Selalu tercipta maksimal 2 gol dalam 6 pertemuan terakhir Milan dan Lazio di semua kompetisi.
Milan menang 4 kali dan cuma kalah 1 kali dalam 8 laga terakhirnya melawan Lazio di Serie A, kandang dan tandang (M4 S3 K1).
Milan selalu menang dalam 3 laga kandang terakhirnya melawan Lazio di Serie A, yakni 2-0 pada musim 2016/17, 2-1 pada musim 2017/18, dan 1-0 pada musim 2018/19.
Milan tak terkalahkan dalam 29 laga kandang terakhirnya melawan Lazio di Serie A (M18 S11 K0), sejak kalah 0-1 gara-gara gol bunuh diri Paolo Maldini pada musim 1989/90 silam.
Pelatih Milan, Stefano Pioli, adalah mantan pelatih Lazio periode 2014-2016. Di Lazio, Pioli membukukan 44 kemenangan dalam 91 pertandingan (M44 S20 K27) dan agregat gol 148-103.
Scroll terus ke bawah untuk statistik yang lebih lengkap.
text:
Serie A Data and Facts: AC Milan vs Lazio
02 Nov 2019, 15:02 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Ranking 10 AC Milan will host Lazio's 5th rank in Week 11 of Serie A 2019/20, Monday (11/04/2019). Here are some data and facts behind this match at San Siro.
In his home match against Lazio in Serie A last season, Milan won 1-0 through a 79th minute Franck Kessie penalty.
The last time entertaining Lazio, in the second leg of the Coppa Italia semifinal last season, Milan gave up 0-1 by a single goal by Joaquin Correa in the 58th minute, and was knocked out 0-1 on aggregate.
Milan have only won 2 times and lost 1 of their last 7 matches against Lazio in all competitions, home and away (M2 S4 K1).
Always created a maximum of 2 goals in the last 6 meetings Milan and Lazio in all competitions.
Milan have won 4 times and only lost 1 of their last 8 matches against Lazio in Serie A, home and away (M4 S3 K1).
Milan always win in their last 3 home matches against Lazio in Serie A, namely 2-0 in the 2016/17 season, 2-1 in the 2017/18 season, and 1-0 in the 2018/19 season.
Milan are unbeaten in their last 29 home matches against Lazio in Serie A (M18 S11 K0), since losing 0-1 because of Paolo Maldini's own goal in the 1989/90 season.
Milan coach Stefano Pioli is a former Lazio coach for the 2014-2016 period. At Lazio, Pioli recorded 44 wins in 91 matches (M44 S20 K27) and aggregate goals 148-103.
Scroll down for more complete statistics.
